lender.name: Sudil
lender.loan_because: every bit counts.
lender.occupational_info: My pleasure.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I feel very lucky to have what little bit that I have. I feel that if I can help someone else who is working hard to better themself or there family then its worth the risk.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a truck all over the USA.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I want to take the opportunities I have to help others and try and make a difference in the world however I can.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am working to get my degree so that I can work at a university campus to help students get through their own education easier and to make them feel more fulfilled.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I understand what it is like not to have enough money. I have had to work very hard for everything I have and only wish to help others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Engineer Officer in the United States Army.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: Many have helped me in the past. I would never have become a nurse if it weren't for my friends who helped me along the way as I struggled financially through school. I believe in "pay it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I work at a very large hospital as a nurse in the emergency room. Many patients are very sick or injured when they come to us. I work 12 hours on the night shift.

lender.name: Mscout2004
lender.loan_because: I want to give a chance of making it to others seeking their own business in third world countries.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: It's my way of sharing my good fortune of being born in Australia. We truly are a lucky country.

lender.name: Wim
lender.loan_because: I like entrpreneurs...

lender.name: Corey
lender.loan_because: Reducing poverty increases stability and quality of life for everyone and in the end reduces population increases.

lender.name: Asim
lender.loan_because: Someone somewhere will get far better utility for this money than I ever will.
lender.occupational_info: I would describe my work as........well soul destroying

lender.name: Kerstin
lender.loan_because: as Edmund Burke said (or perhaps didn't say): "All that is necessary for the triumph of evil is that good men do nothing."
lender.occupational_info: always try to lead by example

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe in making the world a better place. For all of us.

lender.name: Lillian
lender.loan_because: i want to believe in the humanity of humans, including myself.
lender.occupational_info: I live in a foreign country teaching English. It's difficult because I'm far from my home and family, but international understanding is important to me. We are all human and we all have lives. It's important to me to remember that.

lender.name: Tobias
lender.loan_because: sharing makes happier than collecting
lender.occupational_info: I support people with great ideas!

lender.name: CLAUDIA
lender.loan_because: soy mama de 8 hijos abuela de 5 nietos, ex mujer golpeada y necesito trabajar tengo un empredimiento en manualidades
lender.occupational_info: trabajo en toda clases de manualidades pero no puedo comprar los insumos PUEDES VER ALGUNOS DE MIS TRABAJOS EN manualidadesde claudia.ning.com

lender.name: Kevin
lender.occupational_info: I build customized PCs with customized artwork on the sides.

lender.name: Gabby
lender.loan_because: Galatians 6: 9-10 "9Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up. 10Therefore, as we have opportunity, let us do good to all people, especially to those who belong to the family of believers."

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference in someone's life with what little I can afford to give.
lender.occupational_info: I track and collect information about attempted abductions of children by strangers in the US.

lender.name: Ty
lender.loan_because: There really isn't any reason for me not to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior at Bloomsburg University. I am working towards a double major in economics and political science with a minor in public administration.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I think it's important.
lender.occupational_info: I do stuff on things.

lender.name: Junius
lender.loan_because: I owe a debt I will never be able to repay.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to defend their rights in Court, in an effort to pursue justice.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I can and because I want to help

lender.name: Kat
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves an opportunity to improve their life~
lender.occupational_info: I work with drug & alcohol addicts wanting to change their lives.

lender.name: Thomas James Slater
lender.loan_because: Because what people need is business and education. What stands in their way in the developing world is bad governance.
lender.occupational_info: I make sound FX and music for video games. You can talk to me too, I'm klezmerj on aim/yahoo and picopallasi at hotmail.com on msn.

lender.name: Carol Anne
lender.loan_because: How can I not? God gave me this great opportunity to live in such a blessed place so that i can share with as many people as possible. This is a great tool!
lender.occupational_info: I am an accountant.

lender.name: Matt
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university -- helping students afford college.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I've done a lot of traveling and seen families and individuals who are struggling. I want to make a lasting impact on their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help run programs for a non-profit organization, where we help poor families meet their basic needs for food, shelter, and safety.

lender.name: Jamin
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a great job and family. I want other to have the same.
lender.occupational_info: I run a flight school. We teach people how to fly small planes.

lender.name: Cassidy
lender.loan_because: My grandma gave me a Kiva gift card so that I would be able to have a gift that kept on giving.

lender.name: Kath
lender.loan_because: I can! And because everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Ami and Rajeev
lender.loan_because: we want to share our blessings with others.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I really like the concept and the best things happen at a grass roots level
lender.occupational_info: simple sales man

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel connected to people around the world: their struggles, their goals, their accomplishments, their humanity.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: My family is from the Azores (Acores), Portugal and I now loan to people in Mozambique, a former Portuguese colony

lender.name: Ranjitsinh
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: It helps people that really want to try and be independent get help when no one else will help them.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computer and computer networks. I am also a student finishing my BA degree

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to make their life better.
lender.occupational_info: hectic and fun...taking care of my kids!

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because:
I had to rely on someone to raise and support me my whole life and now that I am able to, I should give others the chances my loved ones gave me. If you open your eyes you will see there are so many amazing people in the world, most better than us, who just need and deserve the chance to go after their dreams. No one has the right to consume so much when others have so little.
I help because I wish I had bought my Indian friend David a camel when I had the chance. I will continue looking for David and helping others like him for the rest of my life.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: My brother was killed while serving in Iraq and I want to contribute directly to re-building efforts in the Middle East.
lender.occupational_info: I work with University students to teach them more about God and to help them think about how their faith is important in all areas of their lives.

lender.name: Campbell
lender.loan_because: I'm learning about other people in the world and how to help them

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I am blessed beyond belief. I want my children and my students to understand how they can impact their world through something as small (and powerful) as a microloan.
lender.occupational_info: I teach history at a small boarding school in Pennsylvania. I'm a wife and mother to three wonderful children. My husband and I recently completed the adoption of a precious girl from Ethiopia. We're especially interested in the needs of African women.

lender.name: Petra
lender.loan_because: According to me it's the best and most direct way to help people improve their living in the developing world.

lender.name: HEATHER
lender.loan_because: HELPING PEOPLE IS WHAT WE DO BEST!
lender.occupational_info: THE TOWN THAT I AM FROM LACKS ADULT ENTERTAINMENT. A PLACE TO GET AWAY AFTER A HARD WEEK OF FAMILY AND WORK LIFE. WE PROVIDE THAT GET AWAY FOR YOU.

lender.name: Una
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to have your own business, and I wanted to help in a small way.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: I did my post graduate study about Development Geography, and in particular focusing on community-based development. This is a great scheme - helps those who need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I teach economics, geography, and ICT at an all girls school in New Zealand.

lender.name: Razputin
lender.loan_because: Just because
lender.occupational_info: I like to encourage people to find the positive things in life and have a good laugh doing it.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I wish to support creativity and assertiveness and courage. I admire persons who take risks, believe in themselves and believe they will create a new means of supporting themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired school nurse and former German language teacher. I now part-time as a nurse, I love to work in my garden, I babysit my daughter and son-in-law's almost two-year-old son when they request it, I love to sing in my church choir, and I work every day to save electricity, gas, and water.

lender.name: Ronto
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to help people start successful businesses.
lender.occupational_info:
Annoying my parents, sponsoring social movements to save wolves, web designing for fun, and training my two cats.
And, of course, blogging. =D Everything a normal teenager does.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I have been in the same spot you are in right now. the only difference is I couldn't could not get a loan to save my life. So i want to save yours
lender.occupational_info: I am a honest and hard working person wanting to make a life for myself and a good home for my wife.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I design racing sail boats

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I like to support small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Agricultural, Environmental, and Development Economics

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of the thread of life.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: EVERYONE deserves a chance to succeed in whatever they do!

lender.name: Aaron Henry
lender.loan_because: Providing no interest, affordable loans to the developing world is practical, progressive, and life changing.

lender.name: Richard Nam
lender.loan_because: I believe humans are innately good.
lender.occupational_info: I give scholarships to really smart kids.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowerment!

lender.name: Barbara & Michael
lender.loan_because: We have been in need many times ourselves. Before we met and married, my wife was a single mother, working hard to raise her children, and I lived overseas and both experienced and saw the gravity of extreme need. My wife and I realize that many people, given the opportunity, will reach for and achieve greater things, they just need a chance. We want to be a part of giving that chance, we want to give others the opportunities that we have been given, we want to help.
lender.occupational_info: My wife is a college student and I teach 24 - 10 year old students at a public school. We love making a difference in others lives.

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: I just read the book Creating The World Without Poverty by Muhammad Yunus and it made me wish to partake in microfinance. I am ever so grateful to Kiva to give me this opportunity to reach out to someone on the other side of the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I am what is called a "Doll-Artist". For the last 28 years, my husband and I have been designing and making our own brand of wood and porcelain dolls in our studio and we are very lucky indeed that collectors appreciate and collect them. Since most people find it hard to imagine what an artist-made doll could look like: here is a picture of a wood doll of our production. I am an elderly lady with grey hair now, but looked a little bit like this doll when I was a child. ;=)

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help people lift themselves to a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a member of the U.S. Air Force

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I is nice to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a middle school student in California

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I have money, and others need it. I don't have a lot, but its a whole lot more than others have..
lender.occupational_info:
I create software that runs on computers.
I personally recommend the use of Open Source Software, which is free for anyone to use.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_source

lender.name: ERIC & MARYANN
lender.loan_because: We love to connect with people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Eric assists in the operating room with brain surgery for Parkinsons patients. MaryAnn is a retired homemaker.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: karma points are always a good deal.

lender.name: Martina
lender.loan_because: It is a great idea to help an entrepeneur directly and know about his development.
lender.occupational_info: I am working in international relations of my university, this means cooperations with other universities worldwide, students and professor exchange etc.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Look at the birds of the air; they do not sow or reap or store away in barns, and yet your heavenly Father feeds them. Are you not much more valuable than they? Matthew 6:26 NIV
lender.occupational_info: I am married my wife is a Kindergarten teacher. I have 2 children; one is 17-years old and the other is 13-years old. I am a vacation resort general manager.

lender.name: Ellina
lender.loan_because: I would like to take part in making this world a better place by giving someone else the same opportunities I had growing up in America.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the business of water. My company designs and builds ways to treat water from production waste such as farming, wineries, breweries, etc. as well as wastewater from everyday uses. Our goal is to help preserve control of human consumption as well as the environment we affect around us.

lender.occupational_info: I work at a resort (hotel) as a Security Officer. I make sure all the guests are safe and those who are not staying at the hotel stay off property. I just got promoted to this job so I am fairly new at it so if I think of more I will add it later

lender.occupational_info: I design, program, and troubleshoot electronic control systems and robots for automated machinery for a plastics manufacturer.

lender.occupational_info: I support my home and family by growing vegetables, poultry, and eggs, much like many of the people seeking help through Kiva. But I am fortunate in that I do not need a loan!

lender.name: Oregon Firewalls
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I would hope someone would if they were in my position for those that are seeking capital.
lender.occupational_info: I connect people to everything, everywhere. By using our services you support Kiva directly. To date, we have funded over 50 loans. Our goal for 2012 is to fund 150 loans.

lender.name: Bret
lender.loan_because: I realize how a small effort by me can have a huge impact on someones life
lender.occupational_info: I work on TV commercials and Motion Pictures

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: Lots of people have helped me in my life and I want to help lots of people in theirs.

lender.name: Dan D.
lender.loan_because: I am a material inventor/producer in American society, many people have selflessly invested to help me arrive where I am. Now, I have the choice to continue the investment - and I choose to without hesitation. This has become one of the most rewarding endeavors of my life and I am grateful for this stewardship opportunity through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I design electronics and write software to control machines. Mom, thanks for teaching me to read and Dad thanks for explaining electronics to me. Neither of you had any idea it would pay off in people's lives around the world. But it is.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Brad and Andrea
lender.loan_because: it's great to see that we can make an impact in someone's life for so little.
lender.occupational_info: I love improving the quality of life of the people I see by making them the best limbs possible. I hope to do some international work in the future.

lender.name: Sumit

lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites that help people take care of business.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves to have opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in law school. Occasionally, I get to play pretend lawyer in a pretend court. I also do work helping to incorporate nonprofits. My end goal is to help change how we vote so that we make better collective decisions.

lender.loan_because: I think that everyone deserves a chance to make his or her dreams come out. And we rich West-European people should help others who aren't able to get their first-life-needs!
lender.occupational_info: I do this because the world's prosperity has never been divided good. The rich people get only richer, the poor people only poorer. So I think we've gotta change that thing by helping the people who aren't as rich as others!
